name: Unaware
description:
This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam 2.  I tried to learn as much as I could about the engine in 5 days, after joining the jam a bit too late.Nonetheless I was still able to put a quite fun small action platformer.  

The game is about finding out what your special abilities are and seeing how you can use your awareness, once gained, to your advantage and to help you progress. This is not the final version of the game and I will definitely work more on it to have at least 20 levels.
